info.description: API contains operations on Broker Confirm Routing resource.
info.title: Broker Confirm Routing

post.description:
Create one or more Confirm Routings to a maximum of 100 per request.
Required fields:- brokerTicker,deliveryFormat,deliveryPurpose,deliveryType,recipientContactId.
Users needs to have permissions under permType='brkrDskCon' for using this API.

post.description:
Filters broker confirm routings based on a single broker ticker(for basic filtering) or any combination of the following filters : 
List of broker tickers, broker type and broker entity (for advance filtering).

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsActionType.description:
Represents type of validation being performed.

 - ACTION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - ACTION_TYPE_CREATE: Validation for create request.
 - ACTION_TYPE_UPDATE: Validation for update request.

enumsFilterType.description:
Represents type of filter being performed.

 - FILTER_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - FILTER_TYPE_BASIC: Option for Basic filter- Filters Data on the basis of a single ticker and/or loadDefunct flag.
 - FILTER_TYPE_ADVANCE: Option for Advance filter - Filters data on the basis of advanced filters like list of tickers, BrokerType, entity , etc.
 - FILTER_TYPE_ID: Option for filter on list of id's- Filters data on the basis of list of id's.

rpcStatus.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
[google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

requests.title: Create Broker Confirm Routings request

brokerConfirmRoutings.title: Broker confirm routings

A maximum of 100 broker ConfirmRoutings can be deleted in a batch.
Broker Entity should not be specified at this stage in any delete request.
requests.title: Remove Broker Confirm Routing request

results.description: Broker confirm routings that were deleted.
results.title: Broker confirm routings

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 broker ConfirmRoutings can be updated in a batch.
Broker Entity should not be specified at this stage in any update request.

requests.title: Validate Broker Confirm Routings Request

status.description: The status of the operation in case of failure/success.

brokerConfirmRoutingValidation.description: Represents the validation associated with the broker desk records.

v1BrokerConfirmRouting.description:
BrokerConfirmRouting describes instructions for delivering trade information to a broker desk.
After a trade is booked in Aladdin, it needs to be confirmed with broker. 
Confirm routings are setup at broker level in order for the confirmation deliveries to be created and sent out.

id.description:
Resources must have a 'id' field.
Name describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier.
Routing id.

brokerId.description: Represents Aladdin Broker Identifier (Numeric), commonly referred to as broker code.

deliveryPurpose.description: Purpose of the confirmation delivery. Please see decode named DELIV_PURPOSE.

deliveryType.description: The method of delivery. E.g. fax. Please see decode named BRKR_DELIV_T.

deliveryFormat.description: Format of the delivery. Please see decode named BRKR_FORMATS.

recipientContactId.description: The contact id of the recipient.

autoSend.description: Send automatically true, do not send automatically false.

confirmDeliveryRule.description: JQL to evaluate whether to create delivery.

reviewerSignRequired.description: Boolean flag that tells whether to add digital signature of reviewer to confirm sheet or not.

deliveryStartDate.description: Date in which delivery becomes effective. NULL=no min effective date.

deliveryStopDate.description: Date in which delivery stops being effective. NULL=infinity date.

scheduleName.description: Schedule to follow if auto send is true.

businessPurpose.description: Purpose of delivery from business standpoint. This specifies the type of delivery like Confirm/Recon etc.

v1BrokerConfirmRoutingExtendedQuery.description: The query required to perform a filter query.

brokerTickers.description: Broker ticker for which broker desk data is to be retrieved.

v1BrokerConfirmRoutingQuery.description: The query required to perform a filter query.

loadDefunct.description: Load Defunct Flag - If true , will load all (including defuncts) , else will only load non defunct data.

brokerConfirmRoutingExtendedQuery.description: Broker Confirm routing Extended Query containing additional filters on desk data.

filterType.description: Enum to determine the type of filter being performed - Basic/ Advanced.

v1CreateBrokerConfirmRoutingRequest.title:
The request message for BrokerConfirmRoutingAPI.CreateBrokerConfirmRouting.
(-- api-linter: core::0133::request-parent-required=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this is a top-level
 resource --)

brokerConfirmRoutingQuery.description: Query used to filter broker confirm routings, such as broker ticker.
brokerConfirmRoutingQuery.title: Filter Broker Confirm Routings Query

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of BrokerConfirmRoutings to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified i.e 0, then complete list of
BrokerConfirmRoutings will be returned.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'FilterBrokerConfirmRoutings' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'FilterBrokerConfirmRoutings' must match the call that provided the page
token.

brokerConfirmRoutings.description: Broker confirm routings to be returned.
brokerConfirmRoutings.title: Broker confirm routings

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
Currently the API does not support pagination.

error.description: The error result of the operation in case of failure or cancellation.

output.description: The normal response of the operation in case of success.

v1UpdateBrokerConfirmRoutingRequest.title:
The request message for BrokerConfirmRoutingAPI.UpdateBrokerConfirmRouting.
(-- api-linter: core::0134::request-mask-required=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: Update masks are not being used --)

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.bro: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.broker.v1.BrokerConfirmRouting API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.bro: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.broker.v1.BrokerConfirmRouting API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
